jsky.util.gui
Class ProgressBarUtil

java.lang.Object

                          +--jsky.util.gui.ProgressBarUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class ProgressBarUtil
extends javax.swing.JProgressBar

Adds animation methods to a JProgressBar, to be used, for example, when downloading a URL where the Content-length is unknown.

See Also:
